defaultSnippets.label: InsertRecordTimestampHeaders - Insert record timestamp
defaultSnippets.description: Insert the record's Kafka timestamp into a header. The timestamp is inserted as-is without formatting. Replace header name with your desired header name.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**InsertRecordTimestampHeaders** (Lenses) - Insert the record's Kafka timestamp into a header.

The timestamp is inserted as-is without formatting (Unix epoch milliseconds). Replace header name with your desired header name.

**What it does:** Extracts Kafka's internal record timestamp (when the producer sent the message) to a header.

**Use case:** Access Kafka record timestamps in headers for routing, partitioning, or audit trails without parsing the payload.

**InsertRecordTimestampHeaders** (Lenses) - Insert the record's Kafka timestamp into a header with custom formatting.

Useful for ISO 8601 or other timestamp formats. Replace header name and format as needed.
